Entity.Description: This table stores information for a resource pool. A resource pool represents a collection of resources for providing services. The resources represented by a resource pool should have common characteristics (like regions serviced and skill sets). Capacity for providing services is maintained at the Resource Pool level.
Entity.Name: Res_Pool

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_RES_POOL table.
Attribute.Name: Resource_Pool_Key

Attribute.Description: The identifier of the service slot.
Attribute.Name: Service_Slot_Group_Id

Attribute.Description: The node that is associated with this resource pool.
Attribute.Name: Node_Key

Attribute.Description: The code of the catalog organization. A resource pool is always created wihin the context of a capacity organization. An organization can source services from any resource pool within the same capacity organization.
Attribute.Name: Capacity_Organization_Code

Attribute.Description: The unique identifier of the resource pool.
Attribute.Name: Resource_Pool_Id

Attribute.Description: The unit of measure in which resource pool capacity should be specified.
Attribute.Name: Capacity_Uom

Attribute.Description: The type of item that this resource pool services.
Attribute.Name: Item_Group_Code

Attribute.Description: The code of the organization that owns the resource pool.
Attribute.Name: Provider_Organization_Code

Attribute.Description: The calendar that is associated with this resource pool.
Attribute.Name: Calendar_Key

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether all regions are serviced by this resource pool.
Attribute.Name: All_Regions_Serviced

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether all services are provided by this resource pool.
Attribute.Name: Provides_All_Services

Attribute.Description: The desciption of the resource pool.
Attribute.Name: Resource_Pool_Description

Attribute.Description: The provider contact address that is associated with this resource pool.
Attribute.Name: Provider_Contact_Address_Key

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether this resource pool has capacity information available.
Attribute.Name: Capacity_Info_Available

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether capacity is maintained at the resource level for this resource pool. Default Value is 'N'. If set to Y, resource pool is allowed to define resources, and Standard and/or Override capacity cannot be defined for the resource pool.
Attribute.Name: Cap_Maintain_At_Resource_Level

Attribute.Description: The region schema associated with this resource pool. If region schema is defined for a resource pool, it will override the region schema associated at provider organization level.
Attribute.Name: Region_Schema_Key

Attribute.Description: The flag indicates whether the resource pool is associated to the regions by using service slots. Default value is N.
Attribute.Name: Assoc_Region_By_Slot

Attribute.Description: This field represents the supervisor responsible for the reosurce pool.This will be a valid user ID in the system. This user will belong to the node owning the reosurce pool.
Attribute.Name: Service_Supervisor_Id

Attribute.Description: This field indicates if the resource pool is used for service or dock scheduling. Default value: SERVICE.
Attribute.Name: Purpose

Attribute.Description: This field indicates if there is a restriction on maximum number of concurrent appointments for the resource pool. When this is set to Y, the maximum number of concurrent appointments can be specified for a slot and day in the YFS_RES_POOL_DOW_CAPCTY table (CapacityPerSlot). This is for internal use only. When the Purpose field is passed as DOCK, this will be set to Y. Default value: N.
Attribute.Name: Restrict_Max_Concurrent_Appt

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creation of this record.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last modification of this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The user who created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: The user who last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: The program that created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: The program that last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Entity.Description: This table defines the services that a Resource Pool provides. These services are defined as items in the catalog of the Resource Pool's Capacity Organization.
Entity.Name: Res_Pool_Item

Attribute.Description: A short description for an item.
Attribute.Name: Short_Description

Attribute.Description: Description of an item.
Attribute.Name: Description

Attribute.Description: Primary key attribute of YFS_RES_POOL_ITEM table.
Attribute.Name: Res_Pool_Item_Key

Attribute.Description: Link to YFS_RES_POOL table.
Attribute.Name: Resource_Pool_Key

Attribute.Description: Unique identifier for an item serviced by resource pool.
Attribute.Name: Item_Id

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was created.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was last modified.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: User who created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: User who modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: Program that created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: Program that modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Entity.Description: This table stores the regions that are serviced by a Resource Pool.
Entity.Name: Res_Pool_Region

Attribute.Description: Primary key attribute of YFS_RES_POOL_REGION table.
Attribute.Name: Res_Pool_Region_Key

Attribute.Description: Link to YFS_RES_POOL table.
Attribute.Name: Resource_Pool_Key

Attribute.Description: Link to YFS_REGION table.
Attribute.Name: Region_Key

Attribute.Description: Indicates if Sunday is a working day for the resource pool.
Attribute.Name: Sunday_Valid

Attribute.Description: Indicates if Monday is a working day for the resource pool.
Attribute.Name: Monday_Valid

Attribute.Description: Indicates if Tuesday is a working day for the resource pool.
Attribute.Name: Tuesday_Valid

Attribute.Description: Indicates if Wednesday is a working day for the resource pool.
Attribute.Name: Wednesday_Valid

Attribute.Description: Indicates if Thursday is a working day for the resource pool.
Attribute.Name: Thursday_Valid

Attribute.Description: Indicates if Friday is a working day for the resource pool.
Attribute.Name: Friday_Valid

Attribute.Description: Indicates if Saturday is a working day for the resource pool.
Attribute.Name: Saturday_Valid

Attribute.Description: Priority of the resource pool servicing the region.
Attribute.Name: Priority

Attribute.Description: The start time of the valid slot that the resource pool can serve the region.
Attribute.Name: Start_Time

Attribute.Description: The end time of the valid slot that the resource pool can serve the region.
Attribute.Name: End_Time

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was created.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was last modified.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: User who created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: User who modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: Program that created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: Program that modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Entity.Description: This table defines date ranges for which standard(default) capacity can be maintained for a Resource Pool. These periods cannot overlap for a given Resource Pool.
Entity.Name: Res_Pool_Std_Capacity_Period

Attribute.Description: Primary key attribute of YFS_RES_POOL_STD_CAPCTY_PERD table.
Attribute.Name: Res_Pool_Std_Capacity_Period_Key

Attribute.Description: Link to YFS_RES_POOL table.
Attribute.Name: Resource_Pool_Key

Attribute.Description: Start date of the effectivity period.
Attribute.Name: Effective_Start_Date

Attribute.Description: End date of the effectivity period.
Attribute.Name: Effective_End_Date

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was created.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was last modified.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: User who created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: User who modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: Program that created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: Program that modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Entity.Description: This table defines the standard capacity of each working day/Shift combination for every date range defined in YFS_RES_POOL_STD_CAPCTY_PERD.
Entity.Name: Res_Pool_Dow_Capcty

Attribute.Description: Indicator used to specify if capacity specified is for an undefined slot.
Attribute.Name: UndefinedSlot

Attribute.Description: Capacity will be defined in this UOM.
Attribute.Name: Uom

Attribute.Description: Primary key attribute of YFS_RES_POOL_DOW_CAPCTY table.
Attribute.Name: Res_Pool_Dow_Capcty_Key

Attribute.Description: Link to YFS_RES_POOL_STD_CAPCTY_PERD table.
Attribute.Name: Res_Pool_Std_Capacity_Period_Key

Attribute.Description: Start time of the Shift. For INVENTORY resource pools, this defaults to 00:00:00.
Attribute.Name: Start_Time

Attribute.Description: End time of the shift. For INVENTORY resource pools, this defaults to 23:59:59.
Attribute.Name: End_Time

Attribute.Description: Capacity for Sunday.
Attribute.Name: Sunday_Capacity

Attribute.Description: Capacity for Monday.
Attribute.Name: Monday_Capacity

Attribute.Description: Capacity for Tuesday.
Attribute.Name: Tuesday_Capacity

Attribute.Description: Capacity for Wednesday.
Attribute.Name: Wednesday_Capacity

Attribute.Description: Capacity for Thursday.
Attribute.Name: Thursday_Capacity

Attribute.Description: Capacity for Friday.
Attribute.Name: Friday_Capacity

Attribute.Description: Capacity for Saturday.
Attribute.Name: Saturday_Capacity

Attribute.Description: Supplemental capacity for Sunday.
Attribute.Name: Sunday_Suppl_Capacity

Attribute.Description: Supplemental capacity for Monday.
Attribute.Name: Monday_Suppl_Capacity

Attribute.Description: Supplemental capacity for Tuesday.
Attribute.Name: Tuesday_Suppl_Capacity

Attribute.Description: Supplemental capacity for Wednesday.
Attribute.Name: Wednesday_Suppl_Capacity

Attribute.Description: Supplemental capacity for Thursday.
Attribute.Name: Thursday_Suppl_Capacity

Attribute.Description: Supplemental capacity for Friday.
Attribute.Name: Friday_Suppl_Capacity

Attribute.Description: Supplemental capacity for Saturday.
Attribute.Name: Saturday_Suppl_Capacity

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was created.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was last modified.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: User who created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: User who modified the record.

Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: Program that modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Entity.Description: This table stores capacity overrides for a specific date/shift combination. This overrides the standard capacity for that specific date/shift.
Entity.Name: Res_Pool_Capcty_Override

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_RES_POOL_CAPCTY_OVERRIDE table.
Attribute.Name: Res_Pool_Capcty_Override_Key

Attribute.Description: Capacity will be defined in this UOM.
Attribute.Name: Uom

Attribute.Description: The resource pool associated with this capacity override.
Attribute.Name: Resource_Pool_Key

Attribute.Description: The date for which capacity is given.
Attribute.Name: Capacity_Date

Attribute.Description: The start time of the shift for the specified capacity date. For INVENTORY resource pools, this defaults to 00:00:00.
Attribute.Name: Start_Time

Attribute.Description: The end time of the shift for the specified capacity date. For INVENTORY resource pools, this defaults to 23:59:59.
Attribute.Name: End_Time

Attribute.Description: The capacity for the specified capacity date.
Attribute.Name: Capacity

Attribute.Description: The overridden supplemental capacity for the specified capacity date.
Attribute.Name: Supplemental_Capacity

Attribute.Description: The reason this capacity was overridden.
Attribute.Name: Override_Reason

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creation of this record.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last modification of this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The user who created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: The user who last modified this record.

Attribute.Description: The program that created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: The program that last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: Additional capacity blocked.
Attribute.Name: Additional_Capacity2

Attribute.Description: Additional capacity blocked.
Attribute.Name: Additional_Capacity1

Attribute.Description: The resource pool associated with this capacity consumption.
Attribute.Name: Resource_Pool_Key

Attribute.Description: The date that this capacity consumption is specified.
Attribute.Name: Consumption_Date

Attribute.Description: The shift start time for which consumption is specified. For INVENTORY resource pools, this defaults to 00:00:00.
Attribute.Name: Start_Time

Attribute.Description: The shift end time for which consumption is specified. For INVENTORY resource pools, this defaults to 23:59:59.
Attribute.Name: End_Time

Attribute.Description: The allocated capacity consumed.
Attribute.Name: Allocated_Capacity_Consumed

Attribute.Description: The service resource for which capacity was consumed against.
Attribute.Name: Service_Resource_ID

Attribute.Description: Primary key attribute of YFS_SERVICE_RESOURCE table. The service resource for which capacity was consumed against.
Attribute.Name: Service_Resource_Key

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creation of this record.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last modification of this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The user who created this record.

Attribute.Description: The user who last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: The program that created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: The program that last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: Primary key attribute of YFS_ORGANIZATION table.

Attribute.Description: Service Slot Group Identifier.

Attribute.Name: Parent_Slot_Key

Attribute.Description: Primary key attribute of YFS_SERVICE_SLOT_GROUP table.
Attribute.Name: Service_Slot_Group_Key

Attribute.Description: Service Slot Description.
Attribute.Name: ServiceSlotDesc

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether or not appointments can be taken against this service slot.
Attribute.Name: Can_Use_For_Appt

Attribute.Description: Start time of Slot. For INVENTORY resource pools, this defaults to 00:00:00.
Attribute.Name: Start_Time

Attribute.Description: End time of Slot. For INVENTORY resource pools, this defaults to 23:59:59.
Attribute.Name: End_Time

Entity.Description: This table stores capacity consumption details of reservations, service lines, and work order appointments.
Entity.Name: Res_Pool_Consmptn_Dtls

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_RES_POOL_CONSMPTN_DTLS table.
Attribute.Name: Res_Pool_Consmptn_Dtls_Key

Attribute.Description: Additional capacity blocked.
Attribute.Name: Additional_Capacity2

Attribute.Description: Additional capacity blocked.
Attribute.Name: Additional_Capacity1

Attribute.Description: The capacity consumption associated with this capacity reservation.
Attribute.Name: Res_Pool_Capcty_Consmptn_Key

Attribute.Description: The identifier for this capacity reservation.
Attribute.Name: Reservation_ID

Attribute.Description: The capacity consumed by this reservation.
Attribute.Name: Capacity

Attribute.Description: The date on which the reservation expires. Capacity purge agent will remove reservations based on the reservation expiration timestamp.
Attribute.Name: Reservation_Expiration_Date

Attribute.Description: The order line associated with this capacity reservation. The service line which consumes reservation and blocks capacity.
Attribute.Name: Order_Line_Key

Attribute.Description: The order release associated with this capacity reservation. Only applicable to inventory capacity resource pool.
Attribute.Name: Order_Release_Key

Attribute.Description: The work order associated with this capacity reservation.
Attribute.Name: Work_Order_Key

Attribute.Description: The appointment sequence that reserved the capacity.
Attribute.Name: Appt_Seq

Attribute.Description: The order associated with this capacity reservation.
Attribute.Name: Order_Header_Key

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the reservation is created through the system resource capacity UI. Default value is N.
Attribute.Name: Manually_Created_Reservation

Attribute.Description: The reason this capacity reservation was created.
Attribute.Name: Reservation_Reason

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether capacity was ignored when taking the appointment. Default value is N.
Attribute.Name: Capacity_Overridden

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the consumption is slot based. Default value is Y.
Attribute.Name: Is_Slot_Based

Attribute.Description: The work order appt associated with this capacity reservation.
Attribute.Name: Work_Order_Appt_Key

Attribute.Description: The resource pool associated with this capacity availability.
Attribute.Name: Resource_Pool_Key

Attribute.Description: The code of the catalog organization. A resource pool is always created wihin the context of a capacity organization. An organization can source services from any resource pool within the same capacity organization.
Attribute.Name: Capacity_Organization_Code

Attribute.Description: The node that is associated with this resource pool.
Attribute.Name: Node_Key

Attribute.Description: The unique identifier of the resource pool.
Attribute.Name: Resource_Pool_Id

Attribute.Description: The unit of measure in which resource pool capacity should be specified.
Attribute.Name: Capacity_Uom

Attribute.Description: The type of item that this resource pool services.
Attribute.Name: Item_Group_Code

Attribute.Description: This field indicates if the resource pool is used for service or inventory scheduling.
Attribute.Name: Purpose

Attribute.Description: Delivery Method based on which capacity is defined for this resource pool.
Attribute.Name: Delivery_Method

Attribute.Description: The date that this capacity consumption is specified.
Attribute.Name: Available_Date

Attribute.Description: The shift start time for which consumption is specified.
Attribute.Name: Start_Time

Attribute.Description: The shift end time for which consumption is specified.
Attribute.Name: End_Time

Attribute.Description: Remaining capacity.
Attribute.Name: Available_Capacity

Attribute.Description: Total Standard capacity.
Attribute.Name: Total_Standard_Capacity

Attribute.Description: Total Supplement capacity.
Attribute.Name: Total_Supplement_Capacity

Attribute.Description: Additional Standard Capacity.
Attribute.Name: Additional_Standard_Capacity1

Attribute.Description: Additional Supplement Capacity.
Attribute.Name: Additional_Supplement_Capacity1

Attribute.Description: Additional Standard Capacity.
Attribute.Name: Additional_Standard_Capacity2

Attribute.Description: Additional Supplement Capacity.
Attribute.Name: Additional_Supplement_Capacity2

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creation of this record.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last modification of this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The user who created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: The user who last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: The program that created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: The program that last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Entity.Description: This table is used to synchronize calls fetching resource pool capacity for transactions.
Entity.Name: Res_Pool_Capacity_Lock

Attribute.Description: The primary key of the YFS_RES_POOL_CAPACITY_LOCK table.
Attribute.Name: Res_Pool_Capacity_Lock_Key

Attribute.Description: The resource pool associated with this res pool capacity lock.
Attribute.Name: Resource_Pool_Key

Attribute.Description: The date that this capacity consumption is specified.
Attribute.Name: Available_Date

Attribute.Description: The shift start time for which consumption is specified.
Attribute.Name: Start_Time

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was created.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was last modified.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: User who created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: User who modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: Program that created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: Program that modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid
